title: "The Protective Social Life"

## Protective Social Life

## Prior Socio-Religious Practices

Kissing of hands[^1] - R & R - Forbidden

[^1]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 34

Seeking forgiveness from another - R & R - Forbidden (Don't require another to seek forgiveness from you)

Ascending pulpits[^2] - R&R - Forbidden

[^2]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #154

## Non-Punitive Social Law

Backbiting[^3] - Resp – Forbidden

[^3]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 19

Slander[^4] - Resp – Forbidden

[^4]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 19

Differ on a matter, refer to what has been revealed by Him[^5] - Right & Responsibility

[^5]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 53

Objecting (harrassing, intrude, interfere)[^6] - R&R - Forbidden

[^6]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #73

Boasting[^7] - R&R - Forbidden

[^7]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 72

Reading sciences which lead to disputes[^8] - R&R - Forbidden

[^8]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #77

Contention[^9] - R&R - Forbidden

[^9]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #148

Disputing[^10] - R&R - Forbidden

[^10]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #148

Sadden Hearts and Souls[^11] - R&R - Forbidden - reference to Bayan law[^12] for the annulled fine. Respond with piety and kindness.

[^11]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #148

[^12]: Persian Bayan Vahid 7 Gate 18

Raising voices in streets or marketplaces[^13] - R&R - Forbidden

[^13]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #108

### Involving Property Rights

Trespassing[^14] - R&R - Forbidden

[^14]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #145

Selling and Buying people[^15] - Responsibility - Forbidden

[^15]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 72

Obliterating books[^16] - R&R - Forbidden

[^16]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #77

Begging[^17] - Responsibility - Forbidden

[^17]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #147

## Punitive Social Law

Murder[^18] - R & R – Forbidden – Execution or life imprisonment[^19] & Blood money[^20] / diyah - Notes: A mystical exchange for martyrdom is God Himself[^21]

[^18]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 19

[^19]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 62

[^20]: Kitab-i-Aqdas 52

[^21]: BH00112

Accidental killing[^22] - Pay 100 mithqals of gold to the family

[^22]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #188

Injuries to the head and body[^23] - R&R - Unspecified diyah for each level

[^23]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 56

Striking[^24] - R&R - Forbidden

[^24]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #148

Carrying weapons[^25] - R&R - Forbidden - except in times of necessity

[^25]: Kitab-i-Aqdas #159

Arson[^26] - R & R - Forbidden - Execution by burning

[^26]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 62

Theft[^27] - R & R (right to personal property) - Forbidden & Punishable

[^27]: Kitab-i-Aqdas Verse 45
